<TextLayoutLeft>

To be able to follow the 4px/8px grid, you can install a plugin that makes things a bit easier for you.

<ul class="if ids-doc navigational cards text two">
  <li class="if">
    <a
      target="_blank"
      rel="noreferrer noopener"
      class="if ids-doc navigational-card text box"
      href="https://adobe.com/go/xd_plugins_discover_plugin?pluginId=496c8ba7"
    >
      Download the plugin here
    </a>
  </li>
</ul>

After its installed you need to <strong class="if">manually</strong> add the shortcuts in <strong class="if">MacOS Settings</strong>.

</TextLayoutLeft>

## 1. Open settings and go to keyboard settings

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/xd-nudge-2.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Keyboard settings</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

## 2. Go into Shortcuts

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/xd-nudge-3.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Shortcuts</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

## 3. Click App Shortcuts

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/xd-nudge-4.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">App Shortcuts</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

## 4. Select Adobe XD as application

<TextLayoutLeft>

You might need to <strong class="if">manually</strong> find Adobe XD, and select it (scroll down to "Otherâ€¦" at the bottom to manually find Adobe XD in Applications.<strong class="if"> Be sure to select the application Adobe XD and not the Adobe XD folder.</strong>)

</TextLayoutLeft>

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/xd-nudge-5.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Select Adobe CD</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

## 5. Give your shortcut a name

<TextLayoutLeft>

This naming convention should follow the names that the plugin has, such as <strong class="if">Large Nudge Up</strong>. These names can be found in the Plugin Menu in Adobe XD.

</TextLayoutLeft>

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/xd-nudge-6.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Shortcut name</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

## 5. Give your shortcut a keyboard shortcut

Click Add. Thats it!

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/xd-nudge-7.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Keyboard shortcut</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

You can now see your shortcuts in Adobe XD:

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/xd-nudge-6.1.png" />
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>
